title: The Fiend
content: m18m Remove Curse Lvl 3 Abjuration ActionLevel 3 Warlock Spell Slot Touch a creature or object to remove all Curses and Hexes affecting it. Melee Slow Lvl 3 Transmutation ActionLevel 3 Warlock Spell Slot Alter time around up to 6 enemies to Slow them. They won't get far, they can't do much, and they're easier to hit. 10 turns 18m WIS Save Concentration Stinking Cloud Lvl 3 Conjuration ActionLevel 3 Warlock Spell Slot Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions.
